ComicInfo.Summary:
The are DV8! Bliss, Copycat, Evo, Frostbite, Powerhaus, Sublime and Threshold - writer Warren Ellis created this hardcore super teen team of anti-heroes as a counterpoint to the lighthearted young super hero teams so prevalent in comics!
In the evening of thunderstorm on New York, the members of DV8 are blocked at home. Sideways Bob decides then to tell them its first meeting with Ivana Ba√Øul, while he still worked for the I.O.
DV8 discovers also that Ivana owes its post within the organization thanks to Bob, and that it is herself who extracted his eye several years previously.
ComicInfo.Title: Shades
